full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS MCHOG 'JAM DPAL NAG PO LA BRTEN PA'I SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES 'JAM DPAL NAG PO LA BRTEN PA'I SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DGE SBYOR LA GCIG TU GZHOL ZHING, KHYAD PAR DU LHA MCHOG 'DI'I BSNYEN SGRUB LA BRTZON PA LHUR BYED PA DKA' BCU NOR BU RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES YIG RNYING DANG, LHA BTZUN RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I MNGON RTOGS, BLA MA DAM PA'I GSUNG SGROS SOGS LA GZHI BYAS TE CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
